short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Color Picker: A Chrome extension that enables you to easily identify the color codes of any element on a webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MC Color Picker is a Chrome extension designed to assist web designers, developers, and enthusiasts in easily identifying and extracting color codes from elements on webpages. 

With its user-friendly interface, MC Color Picker simplifies the color selection process. By activating the extension and using the magnifying glass tool, users can click on any element to retrieve the corresponding RGB, HEX, or HSL color code. 

Whether you're working on website design, graphic creation, or other digital projects, Color Picker provides a reliable and efficient solution for precise color analysis. Improve your workflow and save time with MC Color Picker, the essential Chrome extension for accurate color exploration.
